title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9730.4 - Responsibilities and rights at the fair hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9730.4 - Responsibilities and rights at the fair hearing

State Regulations
(a) The contractor must provide complete
copies of its documentary evidence to the hearing officer at the fair hearing
and to the appellant or his/her representative, if such documents were not
already provided. Such documents must be provided without a charge. (b) The contractor must provide a
representative at the hearing along with the file and a written summary of the
case. (c) Such representative must
have the authority to make binding decisions at the hearing on behalf of the
contractor, including the authority to withdraw the action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9730.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
